itunes:title: #81 - Business as an Artist with Brenda Mangalore
title: #81 - Business as an Artist with Brenda Mangalore
description:
Today we're talking with artist and painter, Brenda Mangalore. Brenda was a former client of both Kathleen and Emily, and we were so impressed with her philosophy on taking criticism, selling her work, and being a total boss while doing it, that we had to have her on the show to talk more!

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

Follow Being Boss on Instagram: @beingbossclub

Join the Being Boss Community: beingboss.club/community
